prompts.user_input: I feel like I'm a failure no matter what I do.
I overthink everything and can't fall asleep.
Everything always goes wrong in my life.
No one will ever love me because I'm not good enough.
I can't stop worrying about my future.
I feel like I'm always disappointing everyone.
I keep making the same mistakes over and over.
How do I stop being so hard on myself?
I feel like I'm not making any progress in therapy.
I can't shake the feeling that something bad will happen.
